user.title: Scan for Tuya Devices
user.description: Click Submit to scan your local network for Tuya devices.

device_key.title: Enter Device Key
device_key.description: Enter the local key for device {device_id} at {ip}. You can get this from the Tuya IoT Platform.

error.no_devices_found: No Tuya devices found on your network. Make sure your devices are powered on and connected to the same network.
error.scan_failed: Failed to scan for devices. Check your network configuration.
error.invalid_key: Invalid local key. The device rejected the connection. Please verify the key from Tuya IoT Platform.
error.cannot_connect: Cannot connect to device. Check if the device is online and the key is correct.

abort.no_new_devices: All discovered devices are already configured. No new devices to add.
